channel.title: Nite Lite - Harmony [WIP, Trance, Collab?]
channel.description:
Making a new trance song using most of the instruments from the new Save the Ocean soundpack. I‚Äôve also been using various other instruments that I feel work with them. It‚Äôs a slow and relaxing vibey song and I‚Äôm in love with the literal 3 loops I have so far. Would love to collab on this since I‚Äôm very new to ambience/trance/chillout genres üòä
[https://app.auxy.co/projects/fdeH4nutb37lerlx_Uhnng==](https://app.auxy.co/projects/fdeH4nutb37lerlx_Uhnng==)

item.title: Nite Lite - Harmony [WIP, Trance, Collab?]
item.dc:creator: Alone_in_Rome
item.description:
Awesome! I‚Äôm gonna add some more variation to the sweeper waves sound. With headphones on you can hear it repeating and it gets bland. I‚Äôll probably make a full 8 bar unique automation loop on the low pass so it‚Äôs different ever second

item.title: Nite Lite - Harmony [WIP, Trance, Collab?]
item.dc:creator: GrandpaMusic
item.description:
I agree. It really sounds like how it‚Äôs is to be underwater in my opinion. Sometimes I‚Äôm thrown in a trance thinking of mods to make since it‚Äôs so good already.

I especially like the how the telescope chords have been integrated in scene 7.

Anyway, I‚Äôve added a transition between scenes 4 and 6, and I‚Äôve played around with the melody in scene 7 just a little bit to give it some variation.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/U3ApqwuQX4tgJ1VNNg6R7w==
